title: Follow a player without logging in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on My Teams page on the MLB app
AND I am not logged in to the app
AND I am not following any player
custom_expected:
THEN I should see the Login wall
AND I should see an option to login
AND I should see an option to Create an account

title: Follow multiple players while logged in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on My Players & Teams page on the MLB app
AND I am logged in to the app
AND I am not following any player
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Players"
AND I tap on "Arizona Diamondbacks" to view its players
AND I click FOLLOWS pill for the first player in the list
AND I click FOLLOWS pill for the second player in the list
AND I tap on "Back" 
AND I tap on "Done"
custom_expected:
THEN I should see a the players loaded to my Followed Player section
AND I should see 2 players. in my Followed Player section
AND I should not see "Add Players" link

title: Follow by searching player name
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logging into the app with faveandfollow@gmail.com account
AND I tap on My Teams
AND I am not following any players
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on Add Players link
AND I search for "Babe Ruth"
AND I tap on FOLLOW
AND I tap on Done
custom_expected: THEN I should see Babe Ruth in my Followed Players section

title: Follow player by drilling through team roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logging into the app with faveandfollow@gmail.com account
AND I tap on My Teams
AND I am not following any players
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Players" link
AND I tap on "Atlanta Braves"
AND I scroll down to the end of the player list
AND I tap on FOLLOW pill on the last player [Zach Davies] # at the time of creating this test case
AND I tap on Back
AND I tap on Done
custom_expected: THEN I should see "Zach Davies" in my Followed Player section

title: A non-logged in user can follow a team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am using the MLB app 
AND I am not logged in to the app
AND I am on the My Players & Teams page
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Teams"
AND I tap on "Teams" tab
AND I tap on FOLLOW pill on Arizona Diamondback
AND I tap on FOLLOW pill on Atlanta Braves
AND I tap Done
custom_expected:
THEN I should be brought back to My Players & Teams page
AND I should see Arizona Diamondbacks in my Followed Teams section
AND I should see Atlanta Braves in my Followed Teams section

title: A logged in user following teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logging into the app with faveandfollow@gmail.com account
AND I am on the My Teams & Players page
AND I am not following any teams
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Teams" link
AND I tap on the FOLLOW pill on "Atlanta Braves"
AND I tap on the FOLLOW pill on "Baltimore Orioles"
AND I tap on Done
custom_expected:
THEN I should see Arizona Diamondbacks in my Followed Teams section
AND I should see Atlanta Braves in my Followed Teams section

title: An alert pop up will display when there is no internet connection
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am on My Players & Teams page
AND I am not logged in the app
AND I do not have any favorite team
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on Add your favorite team
AND I turn off the internet connection by switching to airplane mode (wifi should be disabled as well)
WHEN I tap on Atlanta Braves (or any other team)
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an alert message with Offline Mode
AND the favorite team selection will not be saved

title: Search in offline mode
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am using the app 
AND I do not have any Favorite Team set
AND I am not following any players
AND I am not following any team
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on Add Teams
AND I enter "Braves" in the search field
AND I lose internet connection
AND I hit "return" from the keyboard
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an error message
AND I should see "We're sorry something went wrong" message
AND I should see a "Retry" button in Blue

title: Looking into player roster
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am using the app
AND I do not have any Favorite Team set
AND I am not following any players
AND I am not following any team
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on Add Teams
AND I tap on Arizona Diamondbacks
custom_expected:
THEN I should see an error message
AND I should see "We're sorry something went wrong" message
AND I should see a "Retry" button in Blue

title: A non-logged in user can follow a team
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am using the MLB app 
AND I am not logged in to the app
AND I am on the My Players & Teams page
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Teams"
AND I tap on "Teams" tab
AND I tap on FOLLOW pill on Arizona Diamondback

AND I tap Done
custom_expected:
THEN I should be brought back to My Players & Teams page
AND I should see Arizona Diamondbacks in my Followed Teams section
AND I should see Atlanta Braves in my Followed Teams section

title: A logged in user following teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logging into the app with faveandfollow@gmail.com account
AND I am on the My Teams & Players page
AND I am not following any teams
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on "Add Teams" link
AND I tap on the FOLLOW pill on "Atlanta Braves"
AND I tap on the FOLLOW pill on "Baltimore Orioles"

custom_expected:
THEN I should see Arizona Diamondbacks in my Followed Teams section

title: A non-logged in user unfollowing team(s)
A logged in user unfollowing teams
A logged-in user unfollow team(s)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logging into the app with faveandfollow@gmail.com account
AND I am on the My Teams & Players page
AND I am following the Braves
AND I am following the Yankees
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on Edit
AND I tap Delete icon next to Atlanta Braves
AND I tap on Delete button/link on the right
AND I tap Delete icon next to the Yankees
AND I tap on Delete Button/link on the right
custom_expected:
THEN I should not see Atlanta Braves in my Followed Teams
AND I should not see New York Yankees in my Followed Teams
AND I should see Add Teams link in my Followed Teams sections

title: A non-logged in user unfollow team(s)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am not logged into the app
AND I am on the My Teams & Players page
AND I am following the Braves
AND I am following the Yankees
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on Edit
AND I tap Delete icon next to Atlanta Braves
AND I tap on Delete button/link on the right
AND I tap Delete icon next to the Yankees
AND I tap on Delete Button/link on the right
custom_expected:
THEN I should not see Atlanta Braves in my Followed Teams
AND I should not see New York Yankees in my Followed Teams
AND I should see Add Teams link in my Followed Teams sections

title: Unfollow a team by swiping
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am not logged into the app
AND I am on the My Teams & Players page
AND I am following the New York Yankees
AND I am following the Atlanta Braves
custom_steps:
WHEN I tap on Edit
AND I swipe left on New York Yankees
AND I tap Delete
custom_expected:
THEN I should see New York Yankees removed from my Followed Teams section
AND I should see Atlanta Braves in my Followed Teams section

title: First time user logging in
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am MLB user with faveandfollow@mlb.com
AND I have the Chicago Cubs as my Favorite Team
AND I am following Aaron Judge
AND I am following New York Mets
custom_steps:
WHEN I log in to the MLB app for the first time
AND I view My Players & Teams page
custom_expected:
THEN I should see Chicago Cubs as my Favorite team
AND I should Aaron Judge in my Followed Players section
AND I should see New York Mets in my Followed Teams section
AND I should see a button labeled "Follow More Players & Teams"

title: Search for your favorite player
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is searching for a player through the search field
custom_steps: WHEN they search for that player's name
custom_expected: THEN that player and possibly others will be shown

title: Search for non-existing player/team
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is searching for a team or player through the search field
custom_steps: WHEN they search for text that returns no results
custom_expected: THEN they will be shown an error screen that lets them know that no results were found

title: Search with special characters
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is searching for a team or player through the search field
custom_steps: WHEN they perform a search using special characters
custom_expected: THEN they will be shown an error screen that lets them know that no results were found

title: Search for your favorite team
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is searching for a team through the search field
custom_steps: WHEN they search for that team's name
custom_expected: THEN that team will be shown
